page.title: 03DAILY LIFE-SCHOOL BOY
page.content: {Morning playtime}is between 10.35 and 10.55 am. and{lunchtime}is at 12.00 noon until 1.15pm.By 12.30 a.m we have finished lunch then we have play.The whistle goes and we line up to go back into class. We do project work, mathematics ,science, P.E.,games and art during the afternoon. At 2.15pm. there is another playtime which lasts 15 minutes. {We go home}at 3.30pm.Some days there are Clubs after school; I do Rounders, Cricket,Basketball and Atheletics. On Thursday lunchtimes I play Chess. {At home}I watch T.V. until it is 5.00pm. when I have my tea.After tea I go out for about 3 hours playing sport eg.Tennis in the summer and football in the winter. I come in and watch T.V. for about 2 and a half hours before I go to bed.
